book.title: Foundation
book.content: The book introduces Hari Seldon, a brilliant visionary and psychohistorian whose job is to use mathematics and probability to predict the future.

book.title: Foundation and Empire
book.content: The novel continues the saga of the collapse of the Galactic Empire and the rise of the Foundation that tries to shorten the dark times ahead.

book.title: Second Foundation
book.content: It details two unsuccessful attempts to try to find and destroy the Second Foundation.
